body_html:
@pcub If your model structure is different, the only question is are you able to pass your checkpoint through export_tflite_ssd_graph.py.
Regarding changing the non-max suppression op, in TF Lite, we are using a custom op with code here. Please take a look and make changes there as you need to the postprocessing.
body_text:
@pcub If your model structure is different, the only question is are you able to pass your checkpoint through export_tflite_ssd_graph.py.
Regarding changing the non-max suppression op, in TF Lite, we are using a custom op with code here. Please take a look and make changes there as you need to the postprocessing.
body:
@pcub If your model structure is different, the only question is are you able to pass your checkpoint through export_tflite_ssd_graph.py.
Regarding changing the non-max suppression op, in TF Lite, we are using a custom op with code [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/detection_postprocess.cc). Please take a look and make changes there as you need to the postprocessing.
